name: FileUpload.Root
description: A component that is used to upload multiple files.
description_zh: A component that is used to upload multiple files.

allowDrop.description: Whether to allow drag and drop in the dropzone element
allowDrop.description_zh: 是否允许在 dropzone 元素中拖放

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

capture.description: The default camera to use when capturing media
capture.description_zh: 捕获媒体时使用的默认摄像机

directory.description: Whether to accept directories, only works in webkit browsers
directory.description_zh: 是否接受目录，仅在 webkit 浏览器中有效

disabled.description: Whether the file input is disabled

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  dropzone: string
  hiddenInput: string
  trigger: string
  label: string
  item(id: string): string
  itemName(id: string): string
  itemSizeText(id: string): string
  itemPreview(id: string): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

invalid.description: Whether the file input is invalid

locale.description: The current locale. Based on the BCP 47 definition.
locale.description_zh: 当前区域设置。基于 BCP 47 定义。

maxFileSize.description: The maximum file size in bytes
maxFileSize.description_zh: 最大文件大小（以字节为单位）

minFileSize.description: The minimum file size in bytes
minFileSize.description_zh: 最小文件大小（以字节为单位）

name.description: The name of the underlying file input

required.description: Whether the file input is required

events.name: fileAccept
events.description: Function called when the file is accepted
events.description_zh: 接受文件时调用的函数

events.name: fileChange
events.description: Function called when the value changes, whether accepted or rejected
events.description_zh: 值更改时调用的函数，无论是接受还是拒绝

events.name: fileReject
events.description: Function called when the file is rejected
events.description_zh: 文件被拒绝时调用的函数
